title: how does honor banners work?
body:
hi just wandering if anyone knows how many honors you need to get a banner and when do you get the banner?
i currently have:
10 friendly
4 helpful
22 teamwork
5 honorable opponent

please let me know thanks :)
Brooke

replies.body:
They aren't giving out the specific requirements in order for you to receive an honor ribbon to help reduce people trying to farm honor. It can take quite a lot to get a ribbon though (hundreds, possibly more). Just remain a positive player and you may eventually get enough :3

They have plans to improve the system though, so it might not be the same way for long. For more info on the Honor Initiative, read here;

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751854-Honor-System-FAQ

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2861979&page=9#post32098178

I dunno about the 'hundreds' part, personally I got my green ribbon(teamwork) at around 20 points(remember it being 16 but thats rather low so probably a bit higher xD) I think it's more about consistancy, at that time I always complimented everyone individually after the game and said 'Gl all in future games!:)' even tho it was always really awkward coz no one replied...:P

Just always be nice and you'll get all the ribbons(I have 3)!:D

I have: 

68 friendly
17 helpful
295 teamwork
46 honourable opponent

I've had both the green and yellow ribbons- I think it may be ratio to number of games played? Not sure.

I have:

41 friendly
12 helpful
102 teamwork
57 honorable opponent

I've had the green ribbon for ages, not sure when exactly I got it but its more about the consistency of getting honoured.

It's not based on totals, it's based on how many in your recent games mostly.

Also that isn't very many honor's considering your level 30.
